title: 91/350/EEC: Commission Decision of 15 July 1991 altering the adjustment aid to the Portuguese refining industry for raw sugar imported from third countries at a reduced levy for the 1991/92 marketing year into Portugal (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 15 July 1991  altering the adjustment aid to the Portuguese refining industry for raw sugar imported from third countries at a reduced levy for the 1991/92 marketing year into Portugal  (Only the Portuguese text is  authentic)  (91/350/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The adjustment aid provided for in the second subparagraph of Article 9 (4) (c) pf Regulation (EEC) No 1785/81 shall be fixed et ECU 1,58 per 100 kilograms of sugar expressed as white sugar for the 1991/92 marketing year.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 July 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 177, 1. 7. 1981, p. 4. (2) OJ No L 54, 28. 2. 1991, p. 22. (3) See page 27 of this Official Journal.
